title: ISic003109. I.Sicily inscription 003109
body:
Facsimile Images

Δάματρι καὶ [Κ]όραι
[---]ων καὶ ἁ γυνὰ αὐτοῦ Ἀρισ[--- κ]αὶ τὰ τέκνα ἀ̣[νέθηνκαν?]

Apparatus criticus

Korhonen 2004. Line 1 is above the relief, Line 2 is below it.

English translation

To Demeter and Kore/...and his wife Aris...and their children set this up (?)

commentary
